Resampling Validation of a Fitted Model's Indexes of Fit

Source: R/Biomarker.R
rms_validate.Rd

Resampling Validation of a Fitted Model's Indexes of Fit

rms_validate(rms.model, B = 100)

Arguments

B

Bootstrap times

Value

Examples

data(LIRI)
m=loonR::build.logistic.model(LIRI[,c(3,4)],LIRI$status, rms = T)
#> Pls note: Second unique variable is defined as experiment group
#> Setting levels: control = 0, case = 1
#> Setting direction: controls < cases
m=m$model
rms::validate(m)
#>           index.orig training    test optimism index.corrected  n
#> Dxy           0.5199   0.5038  0.5100  -0.0062          0.5261 40
#> R2            0.1991   0.2039  0.1922   0.0117          0.1874 40
#> Intercept     0.0000   0.0000 -0.0564   0.0564         -0.0564 40
#> Slope         1.0000   1.0000  1.0154  -0.0154          1.0154 40
#> Emax          0.0000   0.0000  0.0150   0.0150          0.0150 40
#> D             0.1267   0.1304  0.1218   0.0085          0.1181 40
#> U            -0.0086  -0.0086  0.0009  -0.0096          0.0009 40
#> Q             0.1353   0.1390  0.1209   0.0181          0.1172 40
#> B             0.1296   0.1261  0.1319  -0.0058          0.1353 40
